content:
Dear all,

We are delighted to invite you to the 21st Annual Meet of Calcutta Logic Circle celebrating the upcoming World Logic Day on 14th January.

The website for the conference is here and the schedule can be found here.

Like the previous CLC Annual Meets (some details of which can be found here), there is no registration fees. However, if you wish to register for the conference, you need to fill up this form by 12 January, 2022.

For any queries/concerns/suggestions please write to clcannualmeet2022@gmail.com.

Regards,
Organizing Committee,
21st CLC Annual Meet 2022
https://sites.google.com/view/clc-annual-meet-2022
